## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), (49.5, -80.5), (51.5, -79.5), (60.5, -79.5), (41.5, -77.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), (-9.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-29.5, -49.5), (-18.5, -48.5), (-16.5, -48.5), (-17.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5), (-12.5, -49.5), (-9.5, -49.5), (-17.5, -47.5), (-16.5, -47.5), (-15.5, -47.5), (-14.5, -47.5), (-12.5, -45.5), (-12.5, -43.5), (-10.5, -43.5), (-8.5, -43.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-10.5, -45.5), (-11.5, -45.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-10.5, -49.5), (-11.5, -49.5), (-8.5, -49.5), (-7.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), (-8.5, -44.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when accessing non-existent chests
- Ensure that the chest exists at the specified position before attempting to access it. Verify the position and type of the chest.

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Check if the tile is already occupied by another entity before placing a new entity. Remove any existing entity if necessary.

### Errors due to full inventories
- Regularly check the inventory capacity of chests and ensure there is enough space before inserting items. Consider adding more storage if needed.

### Errors with inserters waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Monitor the source entity's inventory and refill as necessary.

### Errors with inserters blocked by items on the ground
- Ensure that there is a valid destination for the inserter to place items. Clear any obstructions and ensure the destination has space for incoming items.
